publication.authorlist: Hetet G, Devaux I, Soufir N, Grandchamp B, Beaumont C
publication.title: Molecular analyses of patients with hyperferritinemia and normal serum iron values reveal both L ferritin IRE and 3 new ferroportin (slc11A3) mutations

mutation.metadata: The ferritin gene FTL is located on the positive strand of chrosome 19 from 49,468,566-49,470,136 (GRCh37). The numbering used in the publication corresponds to the 5UTR sequence found in NM_000146.3. Therefore, the mutation refered to as 32G>T corresponds to chr19:49468597G>T. This corresponds to NM_000146.3:c.-168G>T.
